00094     public function __construct( $sAppId, $iPTC = SonetrixPlatformTypes::Facebook, $sDevKey = null, $sAppKey = null, $oFacebook = null, $sAppProfileId = null )
00095     {
00096         $this->m_sReferrer = $_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER'];
00097         $this->m_sSourceIP = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
00098         $this->m_sAppId = $sAppId;
00099         $this->m_sAppProfileId = $sAppProfileId;
00100         $this->m_sUserAgent = "Sonetrix API PHP5 Client 0.95b (curl/sonetrix.com) " . phpversion();
00101         $this->m_sDevKey = $sDevKey;
00102         $this->m_sAppKey = $sAppKey;
00103 
00104         //  Set to false to disable Sonetrix
00105         $this->m_bIsValid = true;
00106 
00107         //  Platform type code...
00108         $this->m_iPTC = $iPTC;
00109 
00110         //  The Facebook API object...
00111         $this->m_oFacebook = $oFacebook;
00112 
00113         //  Get demo data if available...
00114         if ( null != $this->m_oFacebook && $this->m_oFacebook->user )
00115         {
00116             //  Store user id
00117             $this->m_sPFUserId = $this->m_oFacebook->user;
00118 
00119             //  Get hash from preferences...
00120             try
00121             {
00122                 $sPref = $this->m_oFacebook->api_client->data_getUserPreference( SonetrixPreferences::HashUID );
00123             }
00124             catch ( Exception $_ex )
00125             {
00126                 $sPref = null;
00127             }
00128 
00129             //  Not there? Make a new one...
00130             if ( null == $sPref || "" == $sPref )
00131             {
00132                 //  Pull demo data...
00133                 try
00134                 {
00135                     $arDemoData = $this->m_oFacebook->api_client->users_getInfo( $this->m_sPFUserId, "birthday,current_location,sex" );
00136 
00137                     //  Set the demo data...
00138                     $iHashUID = $this->setDemoData( $this->array_to_string( $arDemoData ) );
00139                     if ( $iHashUID != "" && $iHashUID != null )
00140                         $this->m_oFacebook->api_client->data_setUserPreference( SonetrixPreferences::HashUID, $iHashUID );
00141                 }
00142                 catch ( Exception $_ex )
00143                 {
00144                     //  Ignore...
00145                 }
00146             }
00147             else
00148                 $this->setHashUID( $sPref );
00149         }
00150     }

00152     /***
00153     *@desc Builds a payload for a Sonetrix request
00154     */
00155     protected function buildPayload( $sCmd, $arData = null )
00156     {
00157         //  Start with the command
00158         $sOut = "c=$sCmd";
00159 
00160         //  Sonetrix application key
00161         if ( null != $this->m_sAppKey )
00162             $sOut = "&ak=" . $this->m_sAppKey;
00163 
00164         //  Sonetrix developer key
00165         if ( null != $this->m_sDevKey )
00166             $sOut = "&dk=" . $this->m_sDevKey;
00167 
00168         //  Add platform type code...
00169         $sOut .= "&ptc=" . $this->m_iPTC;
00170 
00171         //  Add on app id
00172         $sOut .= "&uai=" . $this->m_sAppId;
00173 
00174         //  Add app profile id if available
00175         if ( "" != $this->m_sAppProfileId )
00176             $sOut .= "&uapi=" . $this->m_sAppProfileId;
00177 
00178         //  Add hash uid / demo data
00179         if ( null != $this->m_iHashUID )
00180         {
00181             $sOut .= "&huid=" . $this->m_iHashUID;
00182         }
00183         else
00184         {
00185             if ( null != $this->m_sdDemo )
00186                 $sOut .= "&ud=" . $this->m_sdDemo;
00187         }
00188 
00189         //  Add referrer if available
00190         if ( "" != $this->m_sReferrer && null != $this->m_sReferrer )
00191             $sOut .= "&href=" . urlencode( $this->m_sReferrer );
00192 
00193         //  And source IP address..
00194         $sOut .= "&srcip=" . urlencode( $this->m_sSourceIP );
00195 
00196         //  Add additional parameters if provided
00197         if ( null != $arData )
00198         {
00199             foreach ( $arData as $sKey => $oValue )
00200             {
00201                 $sOut .= "&" . $sKey . "=" . $oValue;
00202             }
00203         }
00204 
00205         return( $sOut );
00206     }

00213     public function setDemoData( $sdData, $bDebug = false )
00214     {
00215         $this->m_sdDemo = $sdData;
00216 
00217         //  Get a hash UID from Sonetrix...
00218         $iHashUID = intval( $this->getRequest( $this->m_sUrl, $this->buildPayload( "hash" ) ) );
00219         $this->setHashUID( $iHashUID );
00220         return( $iHashUID );
00221     }

00231         return( $iHashUID );

00250     public function user_install( $sUser = "", $sSigSessionKey = "" )
00251     {
00252         if ( ! $this->m_bIsValid )
00253             return( false );
00254 
00255         $sPayload = $this->buildPayload( "install", array( "u" => ( $sUser == "" ? $this->m_sPFUserId : $sUser ), "ssk" => urlencode( $sSigSessionKey ) ) );
00256         return( $this->setHashUID( intval( $this->getRequest( $this->m_sUrl, $sPayload ) ) ) );
00257     }

00271         return( $this->getRequest( $this->m_sUrl, $sPayload ) == "OK" );

00281     public function user_pageView( $sUser = "", $sPage = "" )
00282     {
00283         if ( ! $this->m_bIsValid )
00284             return( false );
00285 
00286         $sPayload = $this->buildPayload( "hit", array( "u" => ( $sUser == "" ? $this->m_sPFUserId : $sUser ), "p" => urlencode( $sPage ) ) );
00287         $sResult = $this->getRequest( $this->m_sUrl, $sPayload );
00288         return( $sResult == "OK" );

00301             return( false );

00304         $sResult = $this->getRequest( $this->m_sUrl, $sPayload );
00305         return( $sResult == "OK" );

00359     public function stats_getStatsYMD( $iYear, $iMonth, $iDay = "0" )
00360     {
00361         if ( ! $this->m_bIsValid )
00362             return( null );
00363 
00364         $sPayload = $this->buildPayload( "stats", array( "mm" => $iMonth, "yy" => $iYear, "dd" => $iDay, "hh" => "-1" ) );
00365         $sXml = $this->getRequest( $this->m_sUrl, $sPayload );
00366         return( XmlToArray( $sXml ) );
00367     }

00376     protected function getRequest( $sUrl, $sQueryString )
00377     {
00378         if ( function_exists( 'curl_init' ) )
00379         {
00380             // Use CURL if installed...
00381             $oConn = curl_init();
00382             curl_setopt( $oConn, CURLOPT_URL, $sUrl . "?" . $sQueryString );
00383             curl_setopt( $oConn, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true );
00384             curl_setopt( $oConn, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->m_sUserAgent );
00385             curl_setopt( $oConn, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 60 );
00386             $sResult = curl_exec( $oConn );
00387             curl_close( $oConn );
00388         }
00389         else
00390         {
00391             // Non-CURL based version...
00392             $oContext =
00393                 array('http' =>
00394                     array('method' => 'POST',
00395                         'header' => 'Content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded'."\r\n".
00396                         'User-Agent: ' . $m_sUserAgent ."\r\n".
00397                         'Content-length: ' . strlen( $sQueryString ),
00398                         'content' => $post_string)
00399                     );
00400 
00401             $oContextId = stream_context_create( $oContext );
00402 
00403             $oSocket = fopen( $sUrl . "?" . $sQueryString, 'r', false, $oContextId );
00404 
00405             if ( $oSocket )
00406             {
00407                 $sResult = '';
00408 
00409                 while ( !feof( $oSocket ) )
00410                     $sResult .= fgets( $oSocket, 4096 );
00411 
00412                 fclose( $oSocket );
00413             }
00414         }
00415 
00416         return( $sResult );
00417     }

00425     protected function XmlToArray( $sXml )
00426     {
00427         $arData = array();
00428 
00429         if ( $sXml )
00430         {
00431             $oAttrs = $sXml->attributes();
00432 
00433             foreach ( $sXml->children() as $oChild)
00434             {
00435                 if ( !empty($oAttrs['list'] ) )
00436                 {
00437                     $arData[] = $this->XmlToArray( $oChild );
00438                 }
00439                 else
00440                 {
00441                     $arData[ $oChild->___n ] = $this->XmlToArray( $oChild );
00442                 }
00443             }
00444         }
00445 
00446         if ( sizeof( $arData ) > 0 )
00447         {
00448             return( $arData );
00449         }
00450         else
00451         {
00452             return( ( string )$sXml->CDATA() );
00453         }
00454     }

00462     public function array_to_string( $array )
00463     {
00464        $retval = '';
00465        $null_value = "^^^";
00466        if ( $array != null )
00467        {
00468            foreach ($array as $index => $val) {
00469                if(gettype($val)=='array') $value='^^array^'.$this->array_to_string($val);    else $value=$val;
00470                if (!$value)
00471                    $value = $null_value;
00472                $retval .= urlencode(base64_encode($index)) . '|' . urlencode(base64_encode($value)) . '||';
00473            }
00474        }
00475        return urlencode(substr($retval, 0, -2));
00476     }
00477 
00484     public function string_to_array($string)
00485     {
00486        $retval = array();
00487        $string = urldecode($string);
00488        $tmp_array = explode('||', $string);
00489        $null_value = urlencode(base64_encode("^^^"));
00490        foreach ($tmp_array as $tmp_val) {
00491            list($index, $value) = explode('|', $tmp_val);
00492            $decoded_index = base64_decode(urldecode($index));
00493            if($value != $null_value){
00494                $val= base64_decode(urldecode($value));
00495                if(substr($val,0,8)=='^^array^') $val=$this->string_to_array(substr($val,8));
00496                $retval[$decoded_index]=$val;
00497               }
00498            else
00499                $retval[$decoded_index] = NULL;
00500        }
00501        return $retval;
00502     }

00512     public function processQueryString( $sPFUserId = null )
00513     {
00514         //  Handle query string
00515         if ( isset( $_REQUEST['ids'] ) )
00516             $this->user_trackInvites( $this->getPFUserId( $sPFUserId ), implode( ",", $_REQUEST['ids'] ) );
